name: Submission
description:
The year is 1982, and the Cold War is in full swing. You wake up alone on a submarine, with no memory of who you are or how you got there. All you have is a radio, which is picking up signals from the commander of the submarine, and a spy captain of the enemy forces. Who will you follow? The commander, the spy...or neither?

Submission is a 3D first-person "walking-sim" style game, where the player explores and interacts with their environment to discover the story of the submarine and forge their own narrative.

PC CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Q - Open and close Walkman

Z and X- Change frequency
